about.paragraph2: Today, I'm following a path that combines <bold>software analysis and development</bold> and <bold>artificial intelligence</bold>. I've participated in academic and freelance initiatives involving web, apps, and solutions with <bold>applied AI</bold>, such as <futsallink>Futsallink</futsallink> â€” a platform that connects futsal players and clubs.
about.paragraph3: I enjoy working with modern tools, thinking about good user experiences, and collaborating in teams with clear objectives. I value well-structured projects that require organization, product vision, and constant adaptation.
about.paragraph4: In my free time, I enjoy traveling, practicing sports, and spending time with friends and family. I'm always looking for opportunities that combine purpose, technology, and continuous learning.
